channel.title: Blog on d.o.it
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on d.o.it

item.title: Uninstall "Mobile devices" in Windows 11
item.description: With the Phone Link app on your Windows 11 linked to your iPhone or Android phone. If you don’t need it this is the easist way for me to unistall the app. Run the following PowerShell code with Admin rights: get-appxpackage -allusers *crossdevice* | remove-appxpackage

item.title: Get licenses from used NuGet packages of your .NET Core Solution
item.description: ToDo: Get all licenses from used NuGet Packages in the Visual Studio Solution. Create a licence text file or Excel file with all found license and save all licence as a separate Text File. Let’s try… Best solution so far: jump to Solution 5 or Solution 6 Solution 1: Get-Package   Open Visual Studio .NET Core Solution Open Package Manager Console and execute: Get-Package | Select-Object Id,LicenseUrlOutput Result (Nuget Package Name, License Url):

item.title: MS SQL: Date Format
item.description: Date without time CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) Date with time CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 108) or CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEPART(hh, GetDate())) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEPART(mi, GetDate()))

item.title: Unblock all files in folder with PowerShell
item.description: Unblocks files that were downloaded from the internet with PowerShell in Windows: dir "C:\Users\$Env:UserName\Downloads" | Unblock-FileUnblock-File PowerShell API reference
